group_1.narration: They gathered at the diner again...
However, there was an issue with attendance.

group_1.textLeft: No need to apologize. It was my fault@for asking you out here all of the sudden.

group_1.textRight: Still, I'm sorry! You must've been waiting@for a while...

group_1.textLeft: Please don't worry about it.
I used the time to acquaint myself with the@drink bar!

group_1.textRight: Oh, you really like that thing, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: I do! [chara:300501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And, you know...
I noticed something about it.
It's full of possibilities!
It really is wonderful!
You can drink as much as you like,@of any of the offered beverages...
Do you know what that means? You can mix@drink combinations to your heart's content!

group_1.textRight: (I see... So mixing drinks is a fresh new @experience for her too.)

group_1.textLeft: So, I tried something very novel.
Cola au th√© vert!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]W-wait, is that cola and...green tea?!@Does it...taste good?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, heavens no! It is absolutely revolting.
But being able to experience such a thing@myself...
I would never have thought to try it without@the opportunity the drink bar gives.

group_1.textRight: O-oh, so I guess it's a good thing.

group_1.textLeft: Absolutely. You cannot undervalue the@power of real-life experience.
Come to think of it... It's just like what@happened the last time we met.
Yes, when we fought that Witch.
Our teams fought side by side...

group_1.textRight: Did you get any real-world experience@from that?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes. I learned first-hand...
...about that little "trick" your group has.
